setting.title: Slade Wilson's Penthouse
setting.p: Slade is investigating the Titans but hasn't been able to obtain information about Koriand'r and Raven. He's blaming on betraying the H.I.V.E. and taking the Titans down together using Project Promethium.

setting.title: Mid-Pacific
setting.p: A Navy Transport suddenly finds itself in the middle of an undeclared war.

setting.title: Base Operations
setting.p: Their communication with Carrier F-16 goes dead as they realize the fleet was carrying a thermonuclear warhead. They make a call.

setting.title: Mid-Pacific
setting.p: As the ruins of F-16 lies in the middle of the Pacific, a squadron of trained Frogmen swim towards the fleet.

setting.title: East Hampton's Estate
setting.p: Questor is desperately trying to convince BeasT Boy to take over Dayton Industries, but Beast Boy refuses. Beast Boy tells Cyborg his backstory through flaskbacks of when he was a kid and Steve Dayton and the Doom Patrol. Other than Robotman, Doom Patrol is dead. Speaking of Robotman, he's searching for Steve Dayton.

setting.title: Manhattan, West Eighties
setting.p: Miss Simms is at a grocery store; when she goes home, she ends up kidnapped.

setting.title: Somewhere in the Middle East
setting.p: A plane is lying in wait for its passengers. A few Americans die as they try to capture it on camera.

setting.title: Blue Skies of Manhattan
setting.p: Koriand'r is thinking about her newfound life when she gets shot down by the Terminator. A fight breaks out between the Terminator and Koriand'r, but it isn't long before others surround them and Terminator makes his escape. He uses a bomb to get away as Koriand'r saves the citizens.

setting.title: Slade Wilson's Estate
setting.p: Terminator tells Wintergreen the transmitter is in place when he gets a call from the H.I.V.E. demanding Project: Promethium. He refuses to head the plans over.

setting.title: New York Skies
setting.p: They are flying to the Titans' Tower discussing why Beast Boy doesn't want to take over Dayton Industries

setting.title: Titans' Tower
setting.p: The Titans gather to have a meeting. It's interupted by Terminator due to the transmitter he placed on Koriand'r. He reveals he kidnapped Sarah Simms in order to get the Titans to come to him.

setting.title: Grand Canyon
setting.p: The rescue Sarah Simms by exchanging her life for theirs; they agree to go along with the Terminator's plan of using them to demostrate the bomb made from the Project: Promethium. He wants to sell it to the highest bidder. However, the H.I.V.E. kills off the rest of the competiton leaving themselves as the only bidding. The Terminator planned for this and took from the H.I.V.E. as revenge. Before he can leave, the Titans reveal that they survived the bomb. The bomb wasn't actually from the Promethium, it was stolen from the U.S. Army. The Terminator saw this coming as well and had his army ready to fight. The Titans fight the Army as Terminator uses it to escape. Beast Boy sees him and stops him by fighting. While the Titans win their fight, Beast Boy loses his and is mortally wounded.
